1: A song for going up to worship. When the Lord restored the fortunes of Zion, it was as if we were dreaming.
2: Then our mouths were filled with laughter and our tongues with joyful songs. Then the nations said, "The Lord has done spectacular things for them."
3: The Lord has done spectacular things for us. We are overjoyed.
4: Restore our fortunes, O Lord, as you restore streams {to dry riverbeds} in the Negev.
5: Those who cry while they plant will joyfully sing while they harvest.
6: The person who goes out weeping, carrying his bag of seed, will come home singing, carrying his bundles of grain.
